markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Fissures](/Rules.aspx?ID=651)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 518 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Fissures and other ground ruptures can destabilize structures, but more directly they lead to creatures taking bludgeoning damage from falling into a fissure.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Fissures

text: Fissures Source Core Rulebook pg. 518 4.0 Fissures and other ground ruptures can destabilize structures, but more directly they lead to creatures taking bludgeoning damage from falling into a fissure.
